description:
Will automatically set dynamic row height
based on the material table element parent (head, body, etc).

children.description: Should be valid <tr> children such as `TableCell`.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

hover.description: If `true`, the table row will shade on hover.

selected.description: If `true`, the table row will have the selected shading.

name: TableRow

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.selected: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `selected={true}`.
descriptions.hover: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `hover={true}`.
descriptions.head: Styles applied to the root element if table variant="head".
descriptions.footer: Styles applied to the root element if table variant="footer".
